Description:
BAKGRUND

Nätverket/servern/instansen Biblioverse.online (hädanefter Biblioverse) startades i november 2022 av två mastodonanvändare som till vardags är anställda inom svenska bibliotekssektorn. Nätverket drivs ideellt och är inte framtaget på något initiativ från någon av våra arbetsgivare. De är heller inte involverade i vad vi gör här.

Den svenska delen av fediversumet har sedan lång tid haft få nätverk med nischade inriktningar. De större nätverken har ofta fungerat som ”all-around”-kanaler där det går att prata högt och lågt, om allting och ingenting. Dessa nätverk har tusentals användare som tillsammans skapar ett livligt flöde. Gott så, men vi eftersökte dock ett eget litet socialt hörn, där tjänstemän i svenska bibliotekssektorn dels kunde lära känna varandra och prata om vardagliga ting men även utbyta tankar och erfarenheter från vår profession i ett eget, avgränsat, översiktligt lokalt flöde. Det fina med fediverse är att du ändå kan skräddarsy ditt eget personliga flöde så att det inkluderar användare från andra nätverk.

ATT SKAFFA KONTO PÅ BIBLIOVERSE

Antalet platser på nätverket är begränsat och insläpp sker efter att ansökan har behandlats av oss. I din ansökan finns det också ett fält där du ska ange en motivering till varför du vill ansluta dig till Biblioverse. Presentera dig gärna för oss med ett par meningar i detta fält, men lägg inte så mycket tid på det. För egentligen används denna funktion till att hindra botar från att ta plats. Erfarenheter från större nätverk visar på att detta tillvägagångssätt har varit enormt effektivt mot denna typ av spam.

REGLER PÅ BIBLIOVERSE

Genom att registrera dig på Biblioverse så förpliktigar du dig att följa nätverkets regler. De följer i mångt och mycket de flesta andra mastodonnätverkens framarbetade regelverk. Vi i bibliotekssektorn är väl i grund och botten människor med gott sunt förnuft - och det får ju gärna vara en ledstjärna här också!

Vi uppmuntrar användare av Biblioverse att överväga användarupplevelsen för alla andra här. Det är inte bara en fråga om etikett och tillgänglighet, egentligen. Det handlar om att bara vara en anständig person. Vara snäll. Det kostar praktiskt taget inget att göra saker enklare och trevligare för andra, så lägg till beskrivningar till bilder, skriv hashtaggar med kamelnotation (alltså MedVersalFörVarjePåbörjatOrd), och använd gärna Content Warnings (CW) generöst. Exempel där CW kan tas i beaktning skulle kunna vara inlägg med våldsamma bilder, sex och naket, politik, psykisk ohälsa, bilder med ögonkontakt. Det är ingen exakt vetenskap hur detta ska brukas, och som en motvikt går det också som användare att använda filter för att automatiskt gömma andras inlägg som innehåller ämnen du inte vill ta del av. Lika enkelt går det också att ställa in att CW-inlägg visas ofiltrerat som om de vore "vanliga" inlägg. Mycket i Mastodon går att ställa in till sin egen belåtenhet och användarupplevelse, vilket är en av dess styrkor.

Vidare har vi stolpat upp ett antal riktlinjer under fliken Serverregler nedan. Dessa riktlinjer är inte ett juridiskt dokument och slutlig tolkning görs av Administratörer/Moderatorer på Biblioverse.

Summa summarum: var sjyssta mot varandra, hjälp varandra! Och glöm inte att ha roligt!

VID TRAKASSERIER

Om du blir trakasserad, vänligen rapportera användaren med knappen "..." och sedan "Rapportera". För brådskande frågor, vänligen kontakta en administratör/moderator.

MODERERADE SERVRAR

En av Mastodons fördelar är att man lätt kan klippa av band till andra nätverk i fediversumet så att varken deras användare kan följa er eller att deras innehåll når våra tidslinjer. Vi tycker att det är viktigt att våra användare ska känna sig trygga på Biblioverse, så vi följer med intresse de diskussioner om serverbans som förs och rapporteras av andra admins i fediversumet. Vi gör vårt yttersta för att defederera nätverk som har antidemokratiska agendor, trollfabriker, spam och annat skräp.

FRAMTIDSUTSIKTER

Biblioverse är i dess nuvarande form ett tämligen litet nätverk. Med “litet” menar vi en användarbas upp till 50 användare. I takt med att fediversumet expanderar kanske efterfrågan gör att även vår användarbas behöver utökas till 100. Detta låter förstås optimistiskt, och tiden får utvisa huruvida det blir så. Vi har dock inga som helst ambitioner att bli större än såhär, att samla Sveriges samtliga tjänstemän inom bibliotekssektorn är inte aktuellt. Nätverket ska förbli ett förhållandevis litet och trevligt community, med fokus på kvalitet snarare än kvantitet.

VILL DU BIDRA?

Biblioverse tar i dess nuvarande form inte särskilt mycket tid och monetära resurser i anspråk från oss administratörer. För oss handlar det blott om några hundralappar i månaden, no big deal. Vi kommer aldrig att kräva pengar av er. Vi gör det här för att vi tycker att det är kul, samt för att vi anser att federerade tjänster är spännande och kanske en början på ett förnyat förhållningssätt till sociala medier, bortom övervakning, datainsamling och algoritmstyrda konversationer.

Beroende på omständigheterna så kan det i framtiden öppnas upp möjligheter för att bli moderator på Biblioverse. Hör gärna av dig till administratörerna ifall du är intresserad!

Om du tycker att det vi gör här är toppen och vill bidra med pengar till att upprätthålla driften av Biblioverse så finns det möjlighet att donera pengar till oss. Stort som smått, engångssummor som månatliga inbetalningar, spelar ingen roll. Donationerna går direkt in till det konto som används för att betala nätverkets driftskostnader. Om du vill donera så kan du göra det på Ko-fi.

FELANMÄLAN

Anmäl fel till Administratörer/moderatorer. Inkludera en kort men relevant beskrivning av felet, exempelvis: Vad hände? När hände det? Hur mycket av det hände? Kan du visa ett exempel?

Väl mött, fedinauter!
Elegansen och Akenyg (Administratörer på Biblioverse)
Short: En liten mastodonserver, drivs ideellt av två biblioteksmedarbetare. Målgrupp är yrkesverksamma i bibliotekssektorn, inkl. biblioteksutvecklare och forskare inom biblioteks- och informationsvetenskap.

Description:
Sunet är en del av statliga Vetenskapsrådet och tillhandahåller IT-infrastruktur och digitala verktyg till lärosäten och andra myndigheter. Det här är vår Mastodonserver och den riktar sig specifikt till de som är knutna till högre utbildning och forskning.

Alla som tillhör ett lärosäte i Sverige kan logga in via Single Sign On med SeamlessAccess och det vanliga inloggningsflödet från lärosätet, för att på så sätt skapa ett konto i vår instans.

Kom ihåg att du alltid behöver logga in via knappen SeamlessAccess. Det är viktigt att du anger samma e-postadress som du har i lärosätets katalog när du skapar kontot.

Lösenordet som anges vid kontoskapandet behövs bara just vid kontoskapandet, sedan loggar du in via Single Sign On (SeamlessAccess) med ditt konto från lärosätet och de inloggningsuppgifter du har där.
Short: En server för högre utbildning och forskning i Sverige. Tillhandahålls av Sunet (Swedish University Computer Network)

Description:
Why OSINTukraine ?

OSINT tools to archive, document and debunk the Russian War against Ukraine This project is a Telegram Archive, a News aggregator & publishing engine designed to support Ukraine and keep Ukraine information in the News cycle.

You can check out the project here

To eliminate the language barrier issue as much as possible with the current state of machine translation,

I still remember 2014 and how the invasion of Crimea & Donbass left Ukraine voiceless.

Provide a solution for newsrooms, journalists, activists and basically everyone to have an easier access to this information for certainly, one of the defining moment of our generation in Europe and the global impact the War on Ukraine unleashed.

Hunt for Russian Disinformation narratives and war crimes with the intent to archive it outside big platforms

Find intelligence signal in the ongoing cyberwar leaks and operations to disrupt Putin and the system he controls to wage war on Ukraine.

Pressure European capitals to not concede a pre-cooked defeat with Putin at the cost of Ukraine integrity.

Pressure Western Governments to actually deliver their Help to Ukraine

Boycott Amnesty International until the organization retract the “report” and formally apologies to Ukraine.

Put the Media under pressure for not covering Ukraine, putting constantly the aggressor propaganda instead of the impact of the war against Ukraine.

Pressure Western Governments and allies to Officially designate Russia as a Terrorist State.

Weapons for Ukraine because a genocidal war from a Terrorist State does not get stopped by wishful thinking for peace.

Description:
social.ffmuc.net ist eine von Freifunk München betriebene Mastodon-Instanz

=== Aktuell im Testbetrieb ===

Registrierungen auf social.ffmuc.net sind nur gegen eine monatliche Gebühr möglich, um den Betrieb dieser Instanz und Freifunk München finanziell sicherzustellen.

Daraus ergeben sich weitere Vorteile für die Community:
- Die Hemmschwelle, Inhalte zu veröffentlichen, die gegen die Regeln verstoßen, wird angehoben
- Die Anzahl der Nutzer bleibt in einem moderierbaren Rahmen

Wir möchten jedoch darauf hinweisen, dass der Betrieb dieser Instanz auf einer Best-Effort-Basis erfolgt. Es gibt keine Uptime-Versprechen oder Garantien, dass alles ohne Probleme funktioniert.
Mit der Gebühr sind auch keine Sonderrechte für den eigenen Account verbunden, d.h. Inhalte, die gegen die Regeln verstoßen, werden weiterhin moderiert.
Short:
social.ffmuc.net ist eine von Freifunk München betriebene Mastodon-Instanz

=== Aktuell im Testbetrieb ===

Description:
We're a gaming community that's been floating around on the internet since 2003. Some of us like games.

Started this up as a bit of an experiment, but people use it, so here we are. Feel free to join, we're generally friendly.

We don't sell your information

As far as we're concerned your personal information is yours, we don't sell it or pass it to 3rd parties.

We don't push ads, nor will we. We don't ask for donations as at present the costs of us offering this aren't worth it and we're more than happy to cover the hosting costs to further promote a decentralised open web.

Information about Mastodon apps

If a Mastodon app requests a server for login, that should be entered as mstdn.gamercast.net.

Other amazing things run on gamercast.net like our website, which is why that typically won't work. 🙂

Security

This server scores A+ on Mozilla Observatory and A+ on cryptcheck.fr.

We highly recommend setting up 2FA in your account settings under Account -> Account settings -> Two-factor Auth when using the web interface.

Moderation Team

Please reach out to the moderation team if you have any problems.

  • @RoofusLukas
  • @Paul

Server information

The server is based in Colo-X's Interxion LON 1 datacentre in London, UK.
Short: We're a gaming community that's been floating around on the internet since 2003. Some of us like games.

Description:
This server is a nod to the now defunct streaming service beam.pro. Beam is where many of the people on this server met and hung out until it inevitably shut down. One of the creators of the platform, Matt Salsamendi, would occasionally stream various laser lightshows which is the inspiration of the lasersare.fun domain.

As a result, lasersare.fun is a place that aims to continue that close knit community atmosphere that Beam once had.

The server thumbnail picture is from one of Matt Salsamendi's laser shows. Full credits to him for that.

This server is not affiliated in any way to Beam or Mixer. It is also not affiliated with any of the owner(s) of Beam or Mixer.
Short: A social platform inspired by the now defunct beam.pro streaming service.

Description:
Risk.social is a Mastodon instance for professionals in risk and insurance — although anyone who follows our rules and guidelines is welcome.

Risk.social is working on adhering to the Mastodon server covenant:

  1. Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Server rules and moderation are in effect.
  2. Daily backups. Risk.social is automatically backed up weekly. Working on implementing daily database backups.
  3. At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure. Looking for a suitable emergency admin. Is it you? Apply within.
  4. Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down. Committed.

Funding

Funding is provided from the back pocket of @craig. Should additional funding be necessary, donations will be accepted. Until then, enjoy the free ride!

Reporting and moderation

You can report directly from an individual posting, image, or profile for certain violations, including: spam, abusive or harmful content, inappropriate ads, self-harm and impersonation.

Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a moderation or other action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

This instance is hosted in New York. United States and New York laws apply.
Short: Mastodon server for risk and insurance.

Description:
Orreadi is a portmanteau of the Singaporean English ('Singlish') word 'orreddi' and 'read'. The word 'orreddi' is itself the Singlish (mis)pronunciation of the word "already". Orreadi therefore helps you track all the books you read orreadi and get ideas for what to read next based on what your friends have read orreadi.

Orreadi is hosted and administered in Singapore and welcomes users from across the world.

If you've come from Goodreads or Librarything, yes, Orreadi is a lot like those platforms in that it is in essence a book social network and recommendation site. The difference is that Orreadi runs on open source software called BookWyrm and is a part of the Fediverse. You can seamlessly follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances, and on other Fediverse services like Mastodon and Pixelfed.
Short: Track the books you read orreadi and find out what your friends orreadi read.

Description:
Toots.deds.nl is een project van de vereniging Open Domein. DeDS betekent De echte Digitale Stad, het vervolg van De Digitale Stad uit 1994.

Gratis homepages, gratis e-mail, geen reclame, privacy, onder Nederlands recht. Er zijn 6000+ 'bewoners' van DeDS en ze kunnen hier ook een Mastodon-account nemen. Zie ook https://deds.nl en https://opendomein.nl
Short:
Gebruikers van deds.nl kunnen hier korte berichtjes publiceren. 

Huishoudelijke e-mails zijn afkomstig van dedsmastodon@protagio.nl (bijvoorbeeld bij het inschrijven).

Description:
Welcome!

Partyparrot.social is a brand new mastodon instance dedicated to Sirocco and the Cult of the Party Parrot.

This instance is run by a guy who is brand new to Mastodon and knows nothing! As such user registrations are currently closed while I figure out this brave new world. But I'm a veteran sysadmin and this may change in the future.

In the mean time I've begun setting up some #birdsite #bots to fill in some more content of things I am interested in. Perhaps others will find these useful as well.

#Gaming
IGN
Steam
Epic Games
MMORPG.com
metacritic
Elite Dangerous
Guild Wars 2
Battle.net

#Buffalo #Sports and #News
Buffalo Bills
Buffalo Sabres
WGR 550
WGRZ
BPO
SheasPAC

#Charity
ASPCA
Direct Relief
United Way
Department of Conservation

Sirocco is a member of the endangered species known as the Owl Parrot or Kākāpō. There are only 252 Kākāpō remaining today, donate now.

Description:
Hai!

This is a Mastodon instance for Malaysians hosted in Malaysia.

This instance is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, Matrix or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, This is a great place to start.

What is Mastodon?

Video

What's behind?

  • 4 Nodes: 50 GiB RAM, 32.4 GHz CPU
  • Hashicorp Nomad cluster
  • Linux based
  • 3 x Raspberry Pi 4th model B (running on SSD's)
  • 1 x Dell T20
  • AWS S3 for media storage with CloudFront
  • Automated daily backups for DB and Redis
  • Located in Perak, MY
  • Status page
Short: Malaysian Mastodon server

Description:
A server for the folklore and mythology tribe. A place for us to sit back, enjoy a drink and tell the stories that evoke the spells and the deepest of magics.

We vet all requests to join, if you wish to become part of this community then ensure you fill in the "Why do you want to join?" section with details identifying yourself. You aren't known to us, then please take the time to forge a friendship with the admins first.

All users of this instance are expected to be active uses. Due to the high tuning costs, accounts that do not fill in their profile and do not use their accounts will have them removed after the first month.

A server for the folklore and mythology tribe. A place for us to sit back, enjoy a drink and tell the stories that evoke the spells and the deepest of magics.

Please check the instance rules.

Description:
れこーどんへようこそ！

れこーどんは、レコード好きなひとが集まれる場所としてつくりました。好きなレコードの話や、レコードショップの話など、レコードにまつわる話ができればいいなとおもってます！音楽のお話もなんでも大歓迎です！記録(record)された音楽のお話ならなんでもオッケー！

管理

小さなサーバで運用しており、高負荷には耐えられません。また、管理人の気まぐれでサーバを停止したり、メンテしたり、サービス終了します。メインのアカウントは別のサーバにもたれることを強くおすすめします。

運営主体

個人による運用です。

活動の制限・停止措置について

管理人が問題があると判断した場合、予告なしに活動の制限やアカウントの削除を行います。
Short: レコードがすきな人が集まれる場所があればいいな

Description:
本站是爲自主學習者、深度學習者提供服務的學習社區，爲保證交流質量，不對外開放註冊，僅採取「邀請註冊制」。

若想加入，請寫信給 ciecuo.club@gmail.com，並隨信附上閣下的學習筆記（包括但不限於讀書筆記、觀影筆記等）。
Short: 切磋社區（ciecuo.club）是基於 Mastodon 搭建的自主學習社區。Mastodon 是一個去中心化、無廣告的開源社交網絡軟件，任何人均可搭建自己的網站（instance）。

Description:
Away Message Club is a little Mastodon service for people who miss when the most social we got was carefully choosing song lyrics for our AIM away messages. These rules are based on the policies and goals of other instances such as queer.party, aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. The rules pretty much boil down to "be good to each other", but a few rules I'd like to explicitly list out are as follows:

  • Any content or postings which may be illegal under German or Scottish law are not permitted.
  • Any content or postings containing Nazi symbolism, ideology and the promotion thereof, are strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.
  • Racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and any other discriminatory conduct which attacks any individual or group of individuals based on what they are or what they believe in, is strictly forbidden and also seriously uncool.
  • Any conduct which abuses this Mastodon instance, or which causes harm to other Mastodon instances, and/or the users thereof, is strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.
  • While essentially all posts not violating the above are welcome on this instance, you are asked to be considerate and respectful of others - for example, tagging a post about a controversial subject or a commonly-held phobia using content warnings.
  • Basic parts of your user profile, such as username/display name, profile picture and banner, must not be explicit in nature.
  • Explicit/NSFW content is allowed, but must be appropriately tagged using the sensitive media and content warning tags.

This is not Twitter. Reporting posts that make you feel uncomfortable, or that you feel should be brought to our attention, is encouraged. Your reports will not be ignored, and will be dealt with (usually) within a few days. Due to timezone differences or just the fact that I have a full-time job, it may take more than a week. When filing a report, please include information about why you are making the report.

As this instance, and the fediverse in general, has grown, so too have the moderation demands -- in complex cases, I will reach out to you regarding your report, either to explain the moderation decision taken (if any) or to ask for more information, but for more obvious cases, I unfortunately no longer have the time to notify you as to the status of your report. If your report involves a user or post on another instance, you have the choice of sharing your report with the administration of that instance as well, but the report will always be sent to us.

No moderation actions are automatic whatsoever. Nothing happens without human review, and I try my utmost to do right by the users on this instance. For anything that isn't covered by reporting things in Mastodon, or if you have any questions, concerns or other thoughts, please either direct-message @stoppableforce@awaymessage.club, or email the queries address posted above - this goes directly to my inbox.
Short: a little Mastodon service for people who miss when the most social we got was carefully choosing song lyrics for our AIM away messages

Description:
What is Pan?

Pan is a node of the Fediverse, an ensemble independent servers/communities/nodes that communicate among each others.

A brief story

Tommi, the founder and administrator of this instance, has been a long time Fediverse enthusiastic user.

During Scambi Festival 2022, he invited the Italian collective Etica Digitale to host a Lab about it, and for the occasion we deployed a temporary, experimental Mastodon server.

In November 2022 we decided to step up the game, and found a more stable and meaningful instance. We named it Pan. This instance is born out of the necessity of creating a cozy, friendly, young, enthusiastic and tight community of people who believe in the same values and have some things in common.

Why this name?

Scambi Festival’s staff invented Paneurethic, a neologism synthesizing the essence of our purposes and our values. In a hurry to decide how to name our community, our fabulous Lea and Marghe suggested Pan, from the ancient Greek Πάν (Everything). This terms reflects the chaotic vortex of our collective action, while sharing the root of our neologism.

But how does the pan.rent domain name comes into play?
While scrolling through all the possibile domain names, Tommi stumbled upon this TLD, and he could not avoid thinking about his favorite musical ever, the 1996 Rent, by Jonathan Larson. In particular, this passage seems tailored for us:

We’re not gonna pay
Last year’s rent
This year’s rent
Next year’s rent
Rent rent rent rent rent
We’re not gonna pay rent
’Cause everything is rent

In conclusion, our name wonderfully labels the identity of a group of people and organizations that fight for a better future, for being an “us” for once, instead of a “them”. We are swirling in a messy messed up pan, dominated by the toxic, destructive ethos of Capitalism and egoism.

Our values

In short, we stand everything that entails a better, sustainable and fair future, and we fight for anything against it.

Practically, this means that Pan:

  • stands strongly against Capitalism as an economic model and a mentality
  • believes in the right of gender auto-determination and condemns any kind of gender discrimination
  • strongly favors of any empowerment of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights
  • supports and shares any effort carried out in a choral perspective, and without exploiting anyone
  • sympathizes with under-represented peaceful minorities

Who are we?

Anyone who has a profile on Pan must share some fundamental characteristics:

  • being under-30. We do not discriminate older people and we do not think to be better, but we want to foster debates, dialogue, and sense of belonging among individuals that share the struggles as well as the privileges of belonging to the same generation.
  • understanding English. On this instance, we write, chat, speak, and shout in any language. Still, there needs to be some common ground for dialoguing and understanding each other when it is time to have discussions regarding us all.

Institutions and organizations

Among us, there are not only people, but also associations, institutions, organization and entities. Naturally, no age restriction applies to them, but at the same time we demand a close adherence to our philosophy.

Want to join?

You might have noticed that public subscriptions are closed. This is not because we want to be exclusive, but rather the opposite! We would love to welcome anyone who is interested, but we really want to make sure that you are sure you are convinced to be part of this community, and not of any community.

To be invited to create an account, get in touch! You can also ask us to provide you with links to create more than one account, so that you can take some friends with you!

If you are looking for other communities, check Fediverse Observer’s, FediDB’s, or The Federation’s nodes lists.

Why the Glitch fork of Mastodon?

Pan runs on Mastodon Glitch Edition because it is full of interesting and crazy features, even if it is a bit crazier and unstable: it perfectly reflects this instance’s philosophy.
Short: A tiny, tight, and warm community of friends.

Description:

このサーバーはHostdonによって運営されています。

運営目的

Description: LawSocial is the community of legal professionals, students and those interested in the legal developments in India. The community recognizes the diversity in culture, religion, faith and belief and plans to create a safe and open environment for everyone to speak their mind in a decent way. Help us foster this community. Don’t spam people or post nudity, hate Speech, bully anyone or threaten others with self-injury, abuse or any graphic Violence. We hope LawSocial will be an authentic and safe place for inspiration and expression.
Short: Indian Legal Community
rules:
[{'id': '1', 'text': 'Minimum age: Users must be aged 18 years or older to register for an account. '}, {'id': '2', 'text': 'Free Speech: We encourage our members to engage in meaningful discussions on social, legal and political issues. Description: Snipesearch toot was created after a number of individuals reported they were having accounts limited. These were typically self-employed individuals' self-promoting or Adult workers. Social networking is where the little guy gets his voice and promotes his art, performance or small business without a budget. Social networks used to give everyone a fair footing. So despite the fact Snipe already has Snipesocial.co.uk our network running for over a decade, we created SnipeSearch Toot to allow the little guy to be heard on mastodon.

Description: Welcome to this instance, we're a small instance, run by a couple of admins. We have an 8000 Character limit! Follow the rules and you'll do fine. If you have questions, or need help, or or an instance admin needing to get with the administration team? use the e-mail address to reach both admins at once. Description:
Rules

"Be excellent to each other" is easier said than done, and means different things to different people.

The following rules are a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, silencing or suspension of accounts, at the descretion of the instance administrators, as described in our Terms.

Please report behaviour that bothers you. We will keep your report confidential.

  • We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups. These groups may be characterised by any of the following (though this list is naturally incomplete):

    • ethnicity
    • gender identity or expression
    • sexual identity or expression
    • physical characteristics or age
    • disability or illness
    • nationality, residency, citizen status
    • wealth or education
    • religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism

  • We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.

  • We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

  • We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.

  • We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.

  • We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.

  • Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.

  • Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

Best practices

The list below is a collection of behaviour that we expect to see from our users. If you see a user go against these best practices in a way that bothers you, please file a report and we will talk to them. While these best practices are designed to be guidelines for a good communal instance, repeated malicious unwillingness to follow the best practices will be considered just like breaking a rule.

  • In general, use the tools provided to foster a considerate and accessible atmosphere. This includes the liberal use of content warnings (especially on potentially disturbing or controversial topics), and alt-text captioning of media files.
  • When possible, provide credit for creative works in your posts that are not your own.
  • Uninvited comments about another user's personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may be considered harassment. - Inappropriate sexual attention, comments about appearance and implication of physical contact will not be tolerated toward any non-consenting user.
  • If you post sexual content or gore, use content warnings.
  • If you post advertisements, use a content warning. Advertisements should not be excessive or automated.
  • Bots may only interact with a user when they're invited by that user to do so.
  • Automated posts and high-frequency posts should be unlisted (rendering visible to everybody, but not appearing on the local timeline) to keep the local timeline of our instance a place of community dialogue and human interaction. This extends to bots, feed posters, crossposters, and all other automated posts.
  • In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you're talking to. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.

Attribution

These rules and best practices were inspired by the Terms of bsd.network and chaos.social. Thank you!

This text is free to be adapted and remixed under the terms of the CC-BY (Attribution 4.0 International) license.

Description:
This instance if for all those guys that love a great pair of underwear, be it wearing them and showing them off or to simply admire those who do. We are LGBT friendly and inclusive to all.

==Underwear brands== Underwear brands are welcome to join and promote themselves, we encourage you are friendly and interact with your fans and be respectful to your potential customers. We also as that you self verify your accounts using the rel="me" as shown in your profile.

Content warnings

We fully understand you are here to share your underwear collection and anything that can be seen on a public beach or catwalk is allowed on this instance, marking your media as sensitive is your choice.

As we wish to Federate with others, should your toots be lewd, include nudity, or sexual depictions, content warning should be used.

Profile & header images

All public facing images that are displayed in our profile directory and shared with other instances should be appropriate, therefore kindly refrain from nudity or sexually explicit imagery.

Connected relays

  • https://relay.gay/
  • https://relay.gayfr.social/

Description:
SEE ALSO
LEMMY: https://lem.clinicians-exchange.org
EMAIL LIST: https://www.clinicians-exchange.org

WHO WE ARE
Clinicians Exchange provides a forum for mental health professionals to exchange ideas, resources and expertise including but not limited to ethics, politics, practice building, and clinical issues. It is designed to be a place where practitioners of many disciplines and settings can receive camaraderie and support in our rewarding but challenging work.

PLEASE JOIN OUR EMAIL LIST DISCUSSION
We also have an email listserv with slightly higher confidentiality where professional emails are presumably not subject to being read by the world. Please consider joining us there too at clinicians-exchange.org.

STAFF
@admin -- Michael Reeder LCPC: Owner
@jason -- Jason Hobbs LCSW, M.Div: Owner

CODE OF CONDUCT
Also note SERVER RULES below.

This is a place for professional conversations not for personal psychological help or referrals.

Posts should be related to the practices of professional psychology, counseling, social work, neuroscience, and allied professions. Peer support is allowed.

We intend to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible regardless of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristics.

We wish to create a supportive community where people freely share their passions and are excited and optimistic about each other's successes.

We also work to protect our community from harassment, malicious or illegal content, and individual members whose goals are to disrupt our community and promote their own self-interest at the expense of the community.
Short: This is a Mastodon instance for mental health professionals of all professions, graduate students, and retirees.  See also https://lem.clinicians-exchange.org and https://www.clinicians-exchange.org .

Description:
Mit polsci.social reagiert der Fachinformationsdienst Politikwissenschaft auf das Interesse der politikwissenschaftlich Forschenden, einen offenen Kanal für die Wissenschaftskommunikation bereitzustellen.

Unsere Server-Regeln:

1. Unser Zielgruppe

  • polsci.social richtet sich an Forschende der Politikwissenschaft an Hochschulen und nicht-kommerziellen Forschungseinrichtungen.
  • Damit wir Sie identifizieren können, verwenden Sie bitte eine institutionelle E-Mail-Adresse oder geben Sie diese zumindest im Textfeld "Warum möchtest du beitreten?" an.
  • Die Prüfung, ob Sie zur Nutzung berechtigt sind, erfolgt nach der Registrierung durch die Geschäftsstelle des FID Politikwissenschaft.

2. Sei Du selbst

  • Verwenden Sie Ihren echten Namen und seien Sie Sie selbst.
  • Ihr Ruf in der realen Welt ist hier wertvoll und Ihr Ruf hier ist wertvoll in der realen Welt.

3. Behandle andere mit Respekt

  • Wir tolerieren keine Belästigung, Stalking und Doxxing etc.
  • Wir tolerieren keinen Rassismus, Sexismus, verbalen Missbrauch oder die Diskriminierung aufgrund von Geschlecht oder sexueller Orientierung.
  • Wenden Sie sich nicht an Personen, die deutlich gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen.

4. Inhaltliche Hinweise

  • Beiträge mit sensiblen Inhalt müssen markiert werden. Zum Beispiel Gewaltdarstellungen, Folter oder Tod.
  • Jobanzeigen müssen mit dem Hashtag: #jobs versehen werden, nach dem gesucht und gefiltert werden kann.

5. Haftung und Verfügbarkeit

  • Der FID Politikwissenschaft behält sich vor:
    • Die Nutzungsbedingungen einseitig anzupassen, falls dies aus organisatorischen, technischen oder rechtlichen Gründen erforderlich sein sollte.
    • Den Funktionsumfang des Angebotes jederzeit zu modifizieren. Bei einer Einstellung des Dienstes gewähren wir den Nutzer:innen ausreichend Zeit, um ihre Accounts auf eine andere Instanz migrieren zu können.
    • Jegliche Inhalte unverzüglich zu löschen. Zum Beispiel, wenn diese gegen unsere Regeln oder deutsches Recht verstoßen.
    • Nutzer:innen, die gegen unsere Regeln oder deutsches Recht verstoßen, zu sperren oder zu löschen.
  • Eine Haftung für direkte und indirekte Schäden, die durch die Benutzung oder Einstellung des Dienstes entstehen, ist ausgeschlossen, es sei denn, diese wurden durch ein vorsätzliches oder grob fahrlässiges Verhalten der Mitarbeiter des FID Politikwissenschaft verursacht.

Impressum:

polsci.social ist ein Angebot des Fachinformationsdienstes Politikwissenschaft (Pollux), der von der Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Bremen, GESIS - Leibniz-Institut für Sozialwissenschaften und dem Forschungsdatenzentrum Qualiservice betreut wird.

Herausgeber

Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Bremen
Bibliothekstraße 9
28359 Bremen

Inhaltlich Verantwortliche

Maria Elisabeth Müller - Direktion
Email: direktion@suub.uni-bremen.de
Tel: (0421) 218 59400
Fax: (0421) 218 59610

Umsatzsteuer-Identifikationsnummer: DE 814 169 892

Zuständige Aufsichtsbehörde ist die Senatorin für Wissenschaft, Gesundheit und Verbraucherschutz, Rembertiring 8 – 12, 28195 Bremen.

Description:
g33ks.coffee est un serveur privé, francophone, qui héberge une communauté inclusive & férue de nouvelles technologies <3

En savoir plus sur nous : Tu peux découvrir l'envers du décors de notre serveur Mastodon sur notre blog https://www.g33ks.coffee et comprendre notre démarche : ici on fait du "Small Web", sur des technologies "Open Source". De plus, nous aspirons à proposer une alternative aux autres grosses instances francophones : un espace inclusif et à taille humaine. Nous ne cherchons pas à grossir ;-)

Politique de contenu : Afin de respecter les sensibilités de chacun, nous encourageons l'utilisation de hashtags et/ou du CW et/ou de la case "média sensible", en fonction du sujet abordé. Cela permettra au moins aux autres de filtrer/ignorer ce qui pourrait les offenser (politique, polémique, obscène, contact visuel, santé, drogues, sexe, *phobies, nourriture).

Politique de fédération : Mastodon te permet de voir le contenu et d'interagir avec les utilisateurs de n'importe quel autre serveur du Fediverse. Mais sur g33ks.coffee, tu ne pourras pas interagir avec les serveurs de Meta ou assimilé (voir notre position ici), ni avec ceux qui ne respectent pas nos 5 premières règles (voir ci-dessous).

Politique d'inscription : g33ks.coffee vise à créer un espace sûr pour partager, créer, collaborer et profiter du Fediverse. Ainsi, nous pensons que l'inscription ne doit se faire que sur invitation afin de garantir une croissance saine de notre communauté.

Gouvernance : nous sommes 3 administrateurs bénévoles à assurer la maintenance physique et logique du serveur et à maintenir nos usages, règles et politiques diverses.

Ici, on parle principalement français et anglais / les tâches administratives sont effectuées dans le fuseau horaire UTC+2.
Short: g33ks.coffee est un serveur privé, francophone, qui héberge une communauté inclusive & férue de nouvelles technologies <3

Description:
Welcome to fed.sbcloud.cc

A Mastodon server specifically for those involved in any way in the arts

Location: Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada

You are welcome here if: - you are an artist - visual - musical - sculptor - writer - playwrite - you are a journalist - you agree that all people are equal regardless of race, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, geolocation, anonymity, etc - you reside on the East Coast of Canada

This server is run on an old disused PC running ArchLinux on baremetal, in a residence in New Brunswick, Canada. This server and any services herein are given freely and with ABSOLUTELY NO GUARANTEE.
Short:
A small server for spirited artists and friends, by a musician and free/open software advocate.

A safe space for artists, or people who work in the arts to call home.

Description:
Imprint/Impressum

fedi.science in union with fediverse.science is powered by:

Mission of PERMANIZER publishing house, Germany, is to establish projects as permanent benefits to society, pushed in particular by strong personal commitment until they become self-financing.

Die Mission des PERMANIZER-Verlages besteht darin, Projekte als permanente Bestandteile der Gesellschaft zu etablieren, die nur mit persönlichem Engagement diesseits ihrer Rentabilität angeschoben werden müssen, um später finanziell selbsttragend der Allgemeinheit größtmöglich zu nützen.

Moderation & Administration: Publisher and staff of the German book series/ Herausgeber sowie Mitarbeiter der Buchreihe

DAS NEUE UNIVERSUM (http://www.dasneueuniversum.com)

FUTURE. RESEARCH. ADVENTURE. - On the bottom of true facts and science. ZUKUNFT. FORSCHUNG. ABENTEUER. -Auf dem Boden allgemein anerkannter Fakten und Forschung. Against Fake News, against populism, against despotism, against fashism. Gegen Fakenews, gegen Populismus, gegen Despotismus, gegen Faschismus.

Special Add-On 4 German speaking people: Mit dem Erwerb eines Bandes NEUE UNIVERSUM (aktueller Band 120) im Buchhandel oder eines Bandes bzw. weiterer Produkte über deren Online-Shop unterstützen Sie deren Relaunch sowie diese Mastodon-Instanz -und erhalten als Gegenleistung ein hoch informatives und bleibend wertvolles Sammlerstück !
Short: Fediverse.science unified with Fedi.science. The global fediverse of sciences, using both names  alternatively suitable for each unser name

Description:
Deze instance wordt gerund door de thema-afdeling Digitaal66, een orgaan binnen D66 dat zich bezig houdt met digitale politieke thema’s. Als D66’er ben je van harte welkom als je ook gratis lid van Digitaal66 bent/wordt via mijnD66 (anders kunnen we niet valideren of je D66’er bent). Leden gebruiken de instance op persoonlijke titel.

Met deze instance ondersteunen we het belang van de fediverse en bieden we onze leden een veilige haven voor hun data van waaruit ze Mastodon kunnen gebruiken.

Hoe meld ik me aan?

Je kunt je hier aanmelden. Omdat alleen Digitaal66-leden een account mogen aanmaken op deze instance wordt iedere aanmelding handmatig gecontroleerd, het kan dus even duren voordat we jouw aanmelding hebben beoordeeld. Let erop dat je accountnaam (@gebruiker@digitaal66.social) openbaar is, door een account te maken geef je dus je politieke voorkeur prijs. Mocht je dit niet willen raden we je aan op een andere instance een account te maken. Heb je al een account op een andere instance en wil je die naar die van ons verplaatsen? Een handige handleiding vind je hier.

Waar staat mijn data?

De server waarop de data staat huren we bij OVHcloud, de grootste Europese serverprovider, gevestigd in Frankrijk. We zijn zelf eigenaar van de data die op deze server wordt opgeslagen. We gebruiken de service Masto.host om op deze server Mastodon te hosten en te zorgen dat altijd de nieuwste en veilige versie van Mastodon geïnstalleerd is. Dat betekent dat Masto.host ook op de server kan, we hebben hierover specifiek contact met de eigenaar gehad en hun privacy statement is heel duidelijk, Masto.host zal alleen op de server kijken als dit expliciet door ons wordt gevraagd, als dit door een technisch probleem nodig is, of als er een redelijk vermoeden is van illegale activiteiten. Het hele privacy statement is hier te vinden.

Verder is het goed om te weten dat berichten op Mastodon (ook DM’s) niet versleuteld zijn. Gebruik Mastodon dus nooit om vertrouwelijke informatie te delen.

Wat als de instance ooit stopt?

Het kan zijn dat het bestuur om welke reden dan ook besluit om de instance in de toekomst op te heffen. Zoals beschreven in de eerdergenoemde handleiding kunnen gebruikers dan, met behoud van volgers, overstappen naar een andere instance. Hoewel je al je berichten wel kunt exporteren is het goed om er rekening mee te houden dat je die momenteel nog niet kunt importeren op een nieuwe instance. De oude berichten zijn dus niet zichtbaar op je nieuwe profiel. Als gebruiker kun je er ook altijd voor kiezen om alle data van de server te laten verwijderen.

Hoe werkt de moderatie?

Met Mastodon is het mogelijk om op instance-niveau andere instances te blokkeren. Hierbij houden wij voor nu de blocklijst van Nederland’s grootste instance mastodon.nl aan, gezien onze serverregels zeer gelijkwaardig zijn. Deze regels zijn hieronder te zien. Ook kun je uiteraard zelf ieder account en andere instance op jouw profiel blokkeren.

Andere handige tips vind je hier. We zien jullie op Mastodon!
Short: De Mastodon-instance voor leden van D66 thema-afdeling Digitaal66. Leden gebruiken de instance op persoonlijke titel.

Description:
Vision

Unser Anliegen ist inklusive und damit benutzerfreundliche Fediverse-Instanzen für Menschen mit Österreich-Bezug zu schaffen. Die Teilnahme soll nicht an technischen Hürden scheitern. Im Zweifelsfall entscheiden wir uns immer für die benutzerfreundlichere Gestaltung.

Derzeit betreiben wir einen Mastodon- und einen PeerTube-Server sowie eine als Reiseführer gestaltete Webseite, welchen vor allem den Einstieg erleichtern soll. Dieses Hilfesystem wird durch persönlichen Support ergänzt. Da wir solcherart nicht allzu viele Benutzer versorgen könne, liegt der Fokus dieser Instanz auf engagierten Menschen und Multiplikatoren – egal ob gesellschaftspolitisch, journalistisch oder in welcher Sache auch immer. Es müssen keine Großtaten vollbracht werden, das Bewusstsein, für etwas mehr als nur das eigene Wohlergehen sorgen zu können, genügt schon :-)

Die Vision von fediverse.at zum Nachlesen: tour.fediverse.at/vision/

Eigenschaften und Technik

  • Lange Beiträge: Bis zu 1500 Zeichen darf ein Beitrag lang sein. Damit möchten wir die ausgewogene Darstellung komplexer Zusammenhänge fördern. Noch längere Beiträge sollten bitte in einem Blogartikel beschrieben und dann gerne hier verbreitet und diskutiert werden.

  • Volltextsuche: Auf troet.fediverse.at kann nun auch nach beliebigen Wörtern im Text gesucht werden. Gefunden werden alle Beiträge, die das gesuchte Wort enthalten, wenn es sich um selbst erstellte Beiträge oder Kommentare handelt oder um fremde, die mit einem Lesezeichen versehen wurden.

Server und Standort

Der Server befindet sich im Rechenzentrum der Hetzner GmbH in Helsinki. Backups werden sowohl lokal als auch an einem zweiten Standort aufbewahrt. Der Serverzustand wird laufend technisch überwacht um einen unterbrechungsfreien Betrieb zu ermöglichen.

Finanzierung

Die Finanzierung erfolgt bis Ende 2024 durch den Betreiber, ab dann mittels noch zu definierender Benutzungsgebühren. Personalisierte Werbung und der Verkauf von Kundendaten sind definitiv auch für die ferne Zukunft ausgeschlossen.

Kontakt

Feedback dazu nehmen wir gerne via E-Mail hello@fediverse.at entgegen. Der Serveradmin ist in wirklich dringende Fällen oder sollte die elektropostalische Kontaktaufnahme scheitern auch im Fernsprechnetz unter der Rufnummer +43-664-143 84 18 erreichbar.
Short: Die Instanz für engagierte Menschen und kritische Geister mit Österreich-Bezug - unabhängig von Wohnort oder Staatsbürgerschaft. Persönlich & nutzerfinanziert, Betreiber ist Ingo Lantschner.

Description:
Tucows Social is part of the Mastodon network and is hosted in Toronto, Canada by Tucows. Everyone is welcome to join, but our community is mostly made up of our own brand accounts and staff, and friends of Tucows.

Our instance is operated and funded by Tucows and its employees. You can learn more about Tucows and our various companies at our website.
Short: Tucows Social is part of the Mastodon network and is hosted in Toronto, Canada by the Tucows, the parent company of OpenSRS, Enom, Ascio and Hover, Ting and Wavelo.

Description:
PartyOn

PartyOn, is a Mastodon community for artist, makers, activist and hackers of the decentralized generation.

We cherish creative endeavors and the side missions along the way.

So if you're always partying on art, technology or mutual aid consider joining this server.

This instance is free and hosted as community infrastructure by the Black Hacker collective, DataParty.

Privacy

Want the most privacy while using this mastodon instance? You can access our instance using tor at: http://partyonl2qouspt4ptukmhb66t32ut6orlb5jy5pmicbkgcxtwdoz5ad.onion

Looking for Managed Hosting?

We're happy to help organizations get started with operating their own mastodon instances. my.partyon.xyz

Support

You can support this instance with donations. See ko-fi/dataparty.
Short: PartyOn, is a community for artist, activist, makers and hackers of the decentralized generation!

Description:
Für Hannover. Für Hannoveraner.

Und für diejenigen, die sich Hannover verbunden fühlen.

Eine Mastadon-Instanz für ein besseres Hannover.

Die Regeln in Kürze:

  • Habt euch immer lieb.
  • Respektiert jeden.
  • Auch Kritik ist willkommen, aber Hassrede, Beleidigungen, Beschimpfungen, Diskriminierungen, Verschwörungsthemen führen zum sofortigen Ausschluss.

Description:
Moderation:

Diese Instanz wird gemeinschaftlich von mehreren Menschen moderiert, die diese Arbeit derzeit rein ehrenamtlich leisten:
@micha, @tschert

Themen die wir fördern wollen:

Wir betreiben diesen Mastodon Server als Plattform für Menschen, die sich für Gemeinschaffen / Commoning und
generell für das Teilen von Ressourcen und damit verbundene Themen wie z.b gemeinschaftliches Bauen und Wohnen, geteilte Mobilität,
urbanes Gärtnern und und urbane Landwirtschaft, Energiegemeinschaften usf. interessieren.

Kostenlos, aber wertvoll!

Diese Mastodon Instanz steht euch kostenlos zur Verfügung.
Solange es realitylab gmbh gibt, versuchen wir Tools wie Gemeinschaffen.com oder diese Mastadon Instanz finanziell zu tragen, weil wir sie als wichtige Infrastrukturen für unsere Projekte und die darin wirkenden Menschen sehen.
Um Missbräuchliche Verwendungen des Servers zu vermeiden, bekommt hier nicht jeder einen Account, sondern muss nach der Registrierung erst freigeschalten werden. Wir bemühen uns das so schnell wie möglich zu tun.
Ausgenommen davon sind Registrierungen die einem Einladungslink folgen, den wir z.B. mit einem Gemeinschaffen Newsletter aussenden.
Wer darauf klickt kommt direkt ohne Freischaltung rein.

Ihr seid natürlich frei

Wenn ihr bei uns einen Mastodon Account eröffnet habt, könnt ihr damit jederzeit zu einem anderen Server umziehen.
Ihr könnt euch also hier mal mit Mastodon vertraut machen und euer Profil und eure Postings später mitnehmen.
Ihr seid die Eigentümer eurer Postings und Verbindungen. Das Fediverse machts möglich.

Empfehlungen

  • Bitte seid Sparsam mit Bild und vor allem Videos. Das verursacht Kosten, die wir tragen müssen.
  • Meinungsvielfalt ist ein wesentliches Merkmal eines lebendigen Diskurses, auch wenn es bei unterschiedlichen Meinungen emotional werden kann. Bitte geht auch in diesem Fall respektvoll miteinander und mit den Meinungen anderer um!
  • Wenn rote Linien überschritten werden, gebt den Moderator:innen Bescheid: @micha, @tschert

Beständigkeit des Dienstes

  • Eine eventuelle Stilllegung wird mindestens drei Monate im voraus angekündigt
  • Eine (gänzliche) Übergabe an andere Administrator*innen wird ebenfalls drei Monate im voraus angekündigt.
  • Beides ist nicht naher Zukunft nicht beabsichtigt.

Impressum

https://gemeinschaffen.com/gem/pages/IMPRESSUM/
Short: gemeinschaffen.com ermöglicht dir neben Marktplatz, Blog und Newsletter nun auch gemeinsames Tröten über deine Ressourcengemeinschaft und was dich bewegt. Lasst uns voneinander lernen & vernetzen!

Description:
503junk.house

About

503junk.house is a small Mastodon (Hometown) instance for anarchist-adjacent people in or around Portland, OR. The goal is to have a small community which is built over time both online and offline.

Why the name?

The local area code is 503 (there is also a newer 971, but we went with 503). We also wanted to model our community off of 483punk.house, but with less of a focus on the local punk scene (though that is welcome too!). So junk house was a funny play on words. Put it all together and you have 503junk.house

Features

  • Mastodon style fediverse microblogging
  • 1312 character limit
  • Locals-only posts to share with just 503junk.house community
  • Exclusive lists to follow people on the list but not on your home timeline
  • Other Hometown customizaitons
  • TBD in-person potlucks and other events
  • More to come!

How to join

You can go to the homepage and apply to register. There are requirements to join:

  • Have a current member vouch for you (this may be waived in order to increase diversity on the instance)
  • Be connected to Portland and willing to visit for an in-person event from time to time (like a summer BBQ or something)
  • Agree to server rules
  • Contribute to the community in some way (from spreading the word, adding emojos, moderating, organizing in-person events, etc)

OPSEC

  • IPs are retained for 1 week
  • Backups are retained for 1 week
  • All things posted on mastodon should be consider insecure and public (use encrypted apps for sensitive content or better yet only relay it in-person)
  • You may use Tor or a VPN to access your account, but with these shared IPs your access may be temporarily disabled if we experience attacks.

Policy and Governance

We want to remain small enough that we can talk to each other. We each have roles to play. Within 30 days we will ask you to assign yourself a community role, and if everyone consents then you will be given the privileges you need to fulfill that role (if any). You can also shift roles at a later time if you want, and the whole process will be ad-hoc.

For moderation, those assigned the privileges of moderating will be empowered to moderate without gaining permission first in order to quickly respond to threats. Moderation actions may be reversed after the community discusses the action. Moderation actions are logged for community auditing.

Cost

The service is free. It's a gift. The operating costs to the community do exist though and cost about $80 a month (link to budget spreadsheet forthcoming). Soon there will be a way to donate and give back if you desire to do so, but it's not required.

Architecture

Our servers run on Linode located in their California datacenter. The main server, opossum, is a 4GB VPS. We also have a secondary search server, rat, that is a 2GB VPS. Linode server backups are enabled on opossum. There are two 150GB data stores attached to opossum. The first data store holds the database and the media we upload. The second datastore is used for encrypted backups of the first data store. Firewalls are in place for all servers and unneeded ports are restricted. Remote administration connections require ssh keys to access. Mailgun is used to send server emails.

Backups

Linode backups are made once a day at 4am.

Full backups are made on the first of the month using duplicity. Then daily incremental backups are made at 3am.

At 5am, the encrypted backups are synced offsite to the administrators home computer.
Short: 503Junk.House is a fediverse instance for a small community of Portland area anarchist adjacent people.

Description:
El objetivo de este servidor de Mastodon es servir de foro abierto y punto de encuentro para las personas que formen o quieran formar parte del ecosistema digital de Córdoba.

Hablaremos de tecnología, innovación y cultura y humanismo digital. Si bien la línea principal es esa, este foro no está limitado ni a esa temática, ni a la localización geográfica de Córdoba y provincia, por lo que siéntete libre de unirte y participar para hablar de lo que quieras.

Corduba Tech es una asociación sin ánimo de lucro que trata de favorecer la evolución del ecosistema tecnológico de Córdoba y entorno. Uno de sus objetivos es favorecer el uso de tecnologías habilitadoras, abiertas y distribuidas, por lo que la adopción de Mastodon como herramienta de comunicación y comunidad nos parece acertada.

La forma de unirte a Corduba Tech no es mediante inscripción, sino mediante tu participación. Cuanto más participes y más aportes, más relevante será tu pertenencia. Este foro puede ser una buena forma de empezar y darte a conocer.

También, si crees que evolucionar el ecosistema innovador, creativo, tecnológico y digital de Córdoba puede reportar beneficios a tu desarrollo, puedes apoyarnos económicamente a través de una suscripción de patrocinio de colaboración.

Seremos tan fuertes como lo sea nuestra capacidad de colaboración y apoyo mutuo. Seremos legión.

Javier Jiménez, Presidente de Corduba Tech
Short: Este servidor está mantenido por la comunidad Corduba Tech. Su objetivo servir de foro abierto y punto de encuentro para las personas que formen o quieran formar parte de nuestro ecosistema.

Description:
🇸🇰 Welcome to our Slovak Mastodon server for friends of friends! We're thrilled to have you here. Our community is built upon the idea of fostering meaningful connections and creating a safe and inclusive environment for all members. To ensure that, we have implemented a simple membership process.

Becoming a member of our server is quite straightforward. You have a few options:

Recommendation by an Existing Member: If you already know someone who is a member of our server, simply reach out to them and express your interest in joining. If they recommend or approve you, you're more than welcome to join us! We believe in the power of trusted connections, and this helps maintain a close-knit community.

Direct Contact with an Admin: If you don't know any existing members but are eager to become part of our server, you can contact one of our admins directly. They will be happy to assist you and guide you through the process of joining. Your enthusiasm and genuine interest are important to us, and we appreciate your initiative.

We encourage you to reach out to us and connect with our vibrant community. Once you're a member, you'll gain access to a plethora of engaging discussions, shared interests, and the opportunity to forge new friendships. Our server promotes open dialogue, cultural exchange, and a positive atmosphere for everyone.

We look forward to having you as part of our growing community. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our admin. Together, let's create a space where friendships flourish, knowledge is shared, and conversations thrive. Happy Mastodon-ing! 🐘✨
Short: 🇸🇰 Slovak Mastodon server for friends of friends. You can become a member if you know one of the members or if he directly recommends or approves you. Or contact the admin if you really want to.

[{'id': '2', 'text': 'Sexuálne explicitné alebo násilné médiá musia byť pri zverejňovaní označené ako citlivé. 
Ak vaše príspevky obsahujú viac kože než plážový volejbalový turnaj, nezabudnite ich označiť ako citlivé. Myslite na to ako na internetový ekvivalent "zakryť oči deťom".'}, {'id': '3', 'text': 'Žiadny rasizmus, sexizmus, homofóbia, transfóbia, xenofóbia alebo kastovníctvo. 
Ak máte chuť byť nespravodliví, skúste radšej hranie videohier, kde jedinou diskrimináciou, ktorú môžete vykonávať, je tá proti mimozemšťanom a zombíkom.'}, {'id': '5', 'text': 'Žiadne podnecovanie k násiliu alebo propagácia násilných ideológií.
Ak sa cítite, že musíte rozvíriť dav, začnite radšej flashmob v obchodnom centre, než aby ste vyvolávali chaos na internete.'}, {'id': '6', 'text': 'Žiadne obťažovanie, dogpiling alebo doxxing iných používateľov.
Predstavte si, že váš telefón je ako váš najlepší priateľ - nevyužili by ste ho na šírenie drbov, že? Tak sa správajte aj na internete. Buďte kamarát, nie škodca.'}, {'id': '7', 'text': 'Žiadny obsah, ktorý je na Slovensku nezákonný.
Ak si nie ste istí, či je váš príspevok v súlade so slovenskými zákonmi, opýtajte sa svojej babičky. Ak by ju to šokovalo, pravdepodobne to na server nepatrí.'}, {'id': '8', 'text': 'Nezdieľajte zámerne nepravdivé alebo zavádzajúce informácie.
Predstavte si, že každá nepravda, ktorú zverejníte, vám premení nos na štýl Pinocchia. Veríte, nechcete, aby sa váš nos stal prvotriednym útočiskom pre vtáky.'}, {'id': '9', 'text': 'Rešpektujte osobný priestor emoji.
Používanie emoji je povolené, ale nezneužívajte ich. Ak váš príspevok vyzerá ako výbuch v továrni na emoji, je čas to trochu zmierniť.'}, {'id': '10', 'text': 'Nepoužívajte CAPS LOCK ako CRUISE CONTROL pre efekt.
Držte svoje nadšenie pod kontrolou. Písmená písané veľkými písmenami sa čítajú ako krik, a ak všetci kričíme, nikto nepočuje.'}, {'id': '11', 'text': 'Zabudnite na konšpiračné teórie, ak nejde o mimozemšťanov.
Všetci máme radi dobrý príbeh o mimozemšťanoch, ale udržme naše konšpiračné teórie mimo reality... aspoň kým nás nekontaktujú z Oblasť 51.'}, {'id': '12', 'text': 'Dvojitá kontrola pred zdieľaním "faktov".
Ak ste sa dozvedeli vaše "fakty" od kamaráta, ktorý to počul od niekoho, kto to čítal na internete, je pravdepodobne čas na malý reality check. Vždy dvojmo skontrolujte informácie, pred zdieľním, aby ste sa nestali tým, kto šíri mestské legendy ako "fakty".'}, {'id': '13', 'text': 'Žiadne spoilovanie bez varovania.
Ak ste práve dokončili najnovšiu epizódu toho najhorúcejšieho seriálu a umierate, aby ste o tom mohli hovoriť, nezabudnite dať jasné varovanie pred spoilermi. Spoilovanie je internetovým ekvivalentom, keď vám niekto v kine povie koniec filmu, skôr než začne.'}, {'id': '14', 'text': 'Virtuálny šálok čaju je vždy vítaný.
Ak narazíte na niekoho, kto má zlý deň, ponúknite virtuálnu podporu alebo šálok čaju. Niekedy je všetko, čo človek potrebuje, trochu ľudskosti - aj na internete.'}, {'id': '15', 'text': 'Memy sú skvelé, ale všetko s mierou.
Kto nemá rád dobre načasované meme? Len si dávajte pozor, aby vaše memy neboli jediným komunikačným prostriedkom. Predsa len, komunikácia tvárou v tvár (alebo text v texte) ešte nikoho nezabila.'}, {'id': '16', 'text': 'Ak to nie je roztomilé video s mačiatkami, dvakrát to zvážte.
Internet bol vytvorený pre roztomilé videá s mačiatkami. Ak váš príspevok nie je roztomilé video s mačiatkom (alebo niečím rovnako pozitívnym), zastavte sa a zamyslite sa, či to naozaj stojí za zdieľanie.'}]

Description:
Welcome

Welcome to the Dub Nation Social mastodon server! We're glad you are here. Should we have a mastodon space for warriors fans? Hoping we can get more people from the larger dub nation on to Mastodon.

Reblog is not an endorsement.

Registrations

Account registration is invitation-only, just ask.

Donations

Dub Nation Social is currently provided as a free service but it is not free to operate. Donations are greatly appreciated and will be applied to cover the cost of hosting the system. Donate here.

DMCA Takedown Requests

Please forward any legal inquiries to email address support at dubnation.social.

Source Code

CSS customizations live here https://github.com/dotterandpop/dubnation-css

Your Host

This is a fan site is hosted by Dotter+Pop This site not affiliated with any other fan site or organization.
Short: Dub Nation Social is a community website for social discussions about the Golden State Warriors basketball, NBA, San Francisco, Oakland and the Bay Area.  #dubnation

Description:
We're a group of self-identified bookish people who read books about bookish things. Many of us are professionally associated with rare books either as librarians, scholars, or dealers. Some of us are just bookish folk who like to read about the creation, dissemination, collection, and use of books. Curious about what we've read so far? Scroll through our list of past reads--two years and counting!!

Want to become a member of the Bookish Book Club or learn more about it? Send an email to BookishBookClubConveners@gmail.com and we'll get you set up! We've got a Discord server for chatting, monthly book reads, and occasional movie watches. We're highly bookish but you don't need to be a professional book person, just someone who likes learning about bookish things!

We are for now closed to anyone who is not already a member of the Bookish Book Club.
Short: An instance of Bookwyrm for members of the Bookish Book Club, a club for bookish people to read books bookish things.

Description:
¡Bienvenidos a Green Hill Zone! Una pequeña comunidad con un gran corazón. La primera instancia multilingüe para fans de Sonic el Erizo.

Reglas del servidor

  • Si eres menor de 16 años, según los requisitos del GDPR, no utilices este sitio.
  • No se permite la discusión de política o religión.
  • No se tolera la discriminación o el prejuicio a ningún nivel.
  • Este es un espacio seguro—activamente moderado contra el racismo, el sexismo, la homofobia y la transfobia.

Contenido

  • Relacionado a Sonic: 🌎 Público
  • No relacionado a Sonic: 🔓 No Listado
  • Personal: 🔒 Solo Seguidores
  • Clasificado NSFW/Maduro: ⚠️ Advertencia de Contenido
  • Actividades ilegales, pornografía, gore, spam, publicaciones cruzadas: 🚫 Prohibido

Donaciones: Próximamente

Welcome to Green Hill Zone! A little community with a big heart. The first multilingual instance for fans of Sonic the Hedgehog.

Server rules

  • If you are under the age of 16, per the requirements of the GDPR, do not use this site.
  • Discussion of politics or religion is not allowed.
  • Discrimination and prejudice are not tolerated to any degree.
  • This is a safe space—actively moderated against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.

Content

  • Related to Sonic: 🌎 Public
  • Unrelated to Sonic: 🔓 Unlisted
  • Personal: 🔒 Followers Only
  • Rated NSFW/Mature: ⚠️ Content Warning
  • Illegal activities, pornography, gore, spam, crossposting: 🚫 Prohibited

Donations: Coming soon

Bonvenon al Green Hill Zone! Eta komunumo kun granda koro. La unua plurlingva instanco por fan-oj de Sonic la Erinaco.

Reguloj de la servilo

  • Se vi aĝas malpli ol 16 jarojn, laŭ la postuloj de la GDPR, ne uzu ĉi tiun retejon.
  • Diskutado pri politiko aŭ religio ne estas permesata.

Description:
Kei.Fashion is a server created with the intention of bringing Japanese Street Fashion to the fediverse. All forms of J-Fashion are welcome. We understand not all fashion fits neatly into a box so J-Fashion adjacent fashions are also allowed. This server is not just for posting outfits, you can use it for sharing daily musings and other interests. Please review our rules before joining.

At the moment Kei.Fashion is invite only and will remain so for the immediate future as it grows in order to ensure a safe online space for our users.

Please make sure to keep original copies of your images as Mastodon downsizes large files. This server and its content cannot be guaranteed and may result in data loss should the server stop existing.

By joining this server, you accept that all moderation decisions are left to the final interpretation of the Kei.Fashion admin and moderation team.

Kei.Fashion is fully hosted by Masto.host and is subject to French law.
Short: Kei.fashion is a microblogging server for wearers of Japanese Street Fashion. Lolita/Ouji Fashion, Aristocrat, Decora Kei, Fairy Kei, Gyaru, Cult Party Kei, Genderless Kei, and more.

Description:
Welcome to yeg.bike!

We are a small Mastodon instance created by and for the Edmonton cycling (#yegBike) community, its friends, supporters, and allies around the world.

Admins

  • @Daveography - He/Him

Contact

DM one of the admins above, or drop an email to social@yeg.bike. We're happy to help answer any questions about the Fediverse, and to help guide your move!

Registration

Registrations currently require manual approval by the instance admins. We will accept registrations from any person aged 18+ who is a friend, supporter, or ally of bikes, cycling, and active transportation, and accepts the rules laid out in the section below.

We will also accept registrations for non-profit organizations involved in improving cycling and active transportation in the Edmonton region looking to have a presence in the Fediverse. Contact social@yeg.bike to find out if your organization is eligible.

Existing instance users may create bot accounts, but please contact the instance admins to run it past them first.

Usage Guidelines

Some tips on how to get the most out of Mastodon and to help find new friends and followers:

  • Post an introduction about yourself, tagged with #Introduction as well as other hashtags relevant to your interests, and pin it to your profile
  • When you find friends and follow them, also check out who they follow to expand your network
  • Boost, boost, boost those posts and content you like! There is no algorithm here to bubble-up content automatically, users here rely on those boosts to be seen
  • When you click on a hashtag, you can then follow it like you would follow another user to see more content with that tag in your feed
  • When in doubt, post cat photos

Content Guidelines

Some general tips for providing the best experience for everyone:

  • Add descriptions for images to help those with visual impairments or using screen readers
  • Use Camel-case or Pascal-case hashtags (e.g., yegBike or #CyclingInEdmonton) to help ensure they can be read properly by screen readers
  • Use Content Warnings and mark as Sensitive any content and media that is commonly considered sensitive, triggering, involves common phobias, etc.

Server Info & Funding

yeg.bike is currently being run as a small niche instance on a personal server connected via a domestic Internet connection. It currently costs very little to run, so we're not looking for funding or donations at this time.

This may change if upgrades become necessary down the road, such as if stability or speed become an issue.

What if I'm not into yeg.bike?

If you're interested in joining a Mastodon instance but aren't sure if yeg.bike is the right place for you, we recommend giving mstdn.ca a look.

What is the Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a decentralized social media network made up of thousands of individual server instances run by a variety of individuals, organizations, and companies, meaning no one corporation or individual can own or control it.

Individuals can sign up to any instance that best suits them, and from there can follow users and content from any other instance that is federated with their home instance without needing to register an account on those instances.

Instance administrators can selectively defederate other instances that do not satisfactorily moderate their own users' content.

What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is one of many types of software applications that can participate in the Fediverse. Mastodon provides a birdsite-like social media experience, focused on short text posts (500 characters by default) that may optionally be accompanied by images, and made searchable through the use of hashtags.

Other applications may provide different social media experiences (such as Friendica which is more more FB-like, Pixelfed for photo sharing, and many others), but you can follow their users and see and interact with their content from Mastodon seamlessly.

Recommended Clients

Web

  • yeg.bike (the OG)
  • Elk (if you miss that birdsite muscle-memory)

Android

  • Tusky

iOS

  • Ice Cubes

Land Acknowledgement

This instance is run and operated on Treaty 6 territory - the traditional and ancestral territory of the diverse Indigenous Peoples whose ancestors’ footsteps have marked this territory for centuries, such as nêhiyaw (Cree), Dene, Anishinaabe (Saulteaux), Nakota Isga (Nakota Sioux), and Niitsitapi (Blackfoot) peoples, as well as the Métis’ homeland and the home of one of the largest communities of Inuit south of the 60th parallel.

We acknowledge the many First Nations, Métis and Inuit who have lived in and cared for these lands for generations. We are grateful for the traditional Knowledge Keepers and Elders who are still with us today and those who have gone before us. We make this acknowledgement as an act of reconciliation and gratitude to those whose territory we reside on or are visiting.
Short: A small Fediverse/Mastodon community for the Edmonton (#yegBike) community and friends!

Description:
HHSocial ist eine private Initiative mit dem Ziel, den Umgang mit der Technik und mit verteilten sozialen Netzen besser kennen zu lernen. Anmeldungen an dieser Instanz sind darum nur nach Einladung möglich oder müssen durch die Admins bestätigt werden.

Impressum

Angaben zum Betreiber

Betreiber von HHSocial ist Nils Hammer. Nutzen Sie bitte die unter Über - HHSocial angegebene Email-Adresse zum Kontakt.

Haftungsausschluss

Der Betreiber ist für eigene Inhalte auf dieser Mastodon-Instanz verantwortlich. Er ist jedoch nicht verpflichtet, übermittelte oder gespeicherte fremde Informationen (z.B. Beiträge von Nutzer:innen) zu überwachen oder nach Umständen zu forschen, die auf einen Rechtsverletzung hinweisen. Verpflichtungen zur Entfernung oder Sperrung der Nutzung von Informationen bleiben hiervon unberührt. Eine diesbezügliche Haftung ist jedoch erst ab dem Zeitpunkt der Kenntnis einer konkreten Rechtsverletzung möglich. Bei Bekanntwerden einer Rechtsverletzung werden uverzüglich entsprechende Maßnahmen eingeleitet.

Haftung für Links

Auf HHSocial werden Links zu externen Webseiten verwendet. HHSocial hat auf den Inhalt der verlinkten Seiten keinen Einfluss. Es kann deshalb für diese fremden Inhalte keine Gewähr übernehmen. Für die verlinkten Inhalte sind ausschließlich die jeweiligen Anbieter:innen oder Betreiber:innen verantwortlich. Eine permanente inhaltliche Kontrolle der verlinkten Seiten ist ohne konkreten Anhaltspunkt für eine Rechtsverletzung nicht zumutbar. Bei Bekanntwerden einer Rechtsverletzung werden uverzüglich entsprechende Maßnahmen eingeleitet.

Urheberrecht

Die auf HHSocial durch Nutzer:innen, den Betreiber, die Admins oder die Moderator:innen erstellten Inhalte unterliegen dem Urheberrecht. Die Vervielfältigung, Bearbeitung, Verbreitung und jede Art der Verwertung außerhalb der Grenzen des Urheberrechtes bedürfen in der Regel der schriftlichen Zustimmung der jeweiligen Autor:in bzw. Ersteller:in. Downloads und Kopien sind grundsätzlich nur für den privaten, nicht kommerziellen Gebrauch gestattet. Bei Bekanntwerden einer Urheberrechtsverletzung auf HHSocial werden uverzüglich entsprechende Maßnahmen eingeleitet. Um Hinweis wird gebeten!

Bildnachweise

  • HHSocial Logos (Hamburg Flagge mit Mastodon Maskottchen): Hamburg Flagge (Wikimedia Commons), Mastodon Maskottchen (Wikimedia Commons)
  • Profilbild Alice (Wikimedia Commons)
Short: Hamburgs Energienetze gehören den Hamburger:innen. Warum nicht auch soziale Netze? HHsocial, das soziale Netz aus Hamburg für Hamburg powered by Mastodon.
